Chapter 16 Highlight Certain Countries 16.1 Single Country Highlight survey1 %>% calculate_comp_smry("Q1COVID19") %>% plot_comp_smry(.caption = "Arab Barometer Wave VI, Survey I", .highlight = "Algeria") That code will produce the following graph: 16.2 Multiple Country Highlight survey1 %>% calculate_comp_smry("Q1COVID19") %>% plot_comp_smry(.caption = "Arab Barometer Wave VI, Survey I", .highlight = c("Algeria","Lebanon")) That code will produce the following graph: 16.3 Change Highlight Color survey1 %>% calculate_comp_smry("Q1COVID19") %>% plot_comp_smry(.caption = "Arab Barometer Wave VI, Survey I", .highlight = "Algeria", .highlight_clr = "salma") That code will produce the following graph:
